div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: Akron-Fairgrove Schools is committed to do everything we can to create an academic, orderly, equitable, friendly and positive environment to prepare all students for a good and productive life.
